definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: This paper systematically analyzes the factors of ecological geology influencing the Chinese date quality.
sentences.chinese: 系統分析了影響大棗品質的生態地質因素。

sentences.english: Dumplings are dates and raisins, sweet.
sentences.chinese: 糉子是大棗和葡萄乾的，甜甜的。

sentences.english: Zizyphus jujuba of Yiwu is one of fine species of jujube in our country.
sentences.chinese: 義烏大棗是我國優良棗子品種之一。

definition: Gorgon fruit/Semen euryales (botany)/see also 雞頭米|鸡头米[ji1 tou2 mi3]
dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
poor man's ginseng (Codonopsis pilosula)/codonopsis root (used in TCM)
donkey-hide gelatin (used in TCM)/Taiwan pr. [a1 jiao1]
King Solomon's seal (plant of genus Polygonatum)
black atractylodes rhizome (dried rhizome of any of several atractylodes species) (TCM)
monk fruit, the sweet fruit of Siraitia grosvenorii, a vine of the Curcubitaceae family native to southern China and northern Thailand, used in Chinese medicine
